entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of thundershowers in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
